alert.note: Alert for Grenada; Montgomery (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 05 at 3:55PM CDT until April 05 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN GRENADA...NORTHWESTERN WEBSTER AND CENTRAL MONTGOMERY COUNTIES... At 354 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lodi, or 8 miles east of Winona, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Lodi and Sweatman around 400 PM CDT. Embry around 415 PM CDT. Bellefontaine around 420 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
